name: tooltip
desc: Sets the definition for the graph's tooltip object.

attrs.name: html-modehtmlMode
attrs.desc: Sets whether the tooltip is rendered using just the html DIV element/s instead of render specific elements. This is useful when complex
attrs.example: html code needs to be rendered inside the tooltip, however, it may require explicit setting of tooltip's width and height attributes.

attrs.name: sticky
attrs.desc: Forces the tooltip to remain active for a period even if the mouse has left the respective area.

attrs.name: timeout
attrs.desc: Time in milliseconds that a sticky tooltip will stay active after the mouse has left the active area.

attrs.name: alpha
attrs.desc: Sets the transparency of the object. Values must range between 0.0 and 1.0, with 0.0 being completely invisible and 1.0 being completely opaque. Please note that values also require the leading 0 before the decimal.

attrs.name: angle
attrs.desc: Sets the rotation angle of the object/shape.

attrs.name: background-colorbackgroundColor
attrs.desc: Sets the background color of the object.  Colors can be entered by name (e.g. "red", "blue", "yellow"), in hexadecimal notation (e.g. "#FF0000", "#0000FF", "#FFFF00"), or in RGB notation (e.g. "rgb(255,0,0)", "rgb(0,0,255)", "rgb(255,255,0)").  One color will set a solid background color, two colors will, by default, create a horizontal gradient.  For more complex gradients, use gradient-colors and gradient-stops.

attrs.name: background-color-1backgroundColor1
attrs.desc: Sets the first color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.  To be used with background-color-2.

attrs.name: background-color-2backgroundColor2
attrs.desc: Sets the second color of a 2 color background gradient of the object.  To be used with background-color-1.

attrs.name: background-fitbackgroundFit
attrs.desc: Sets the direction/s on which the background image is being "stretched".

attrs.name: background-imagebackgroundImage
attrs.desc: Sets a background image for the object. Value can be a local file or a web image's location.

attrs.name: background-positionbackgroundPosition
attrs.desc: Sets the position of the background when the background-repeat value is no-repeat.

attrs.name: background-repeatbackgroundRepeat
attrs.desc: Sets the repeating mode for the background image.

attrs.name: border-bottomborderBottom
attrs.desc: Sets the object's bottom border style.  Accepts solid, dashed, and dotted styles.  Defaults to black if color is not properly set.

attrs.name: border-colorborderColor
attrs.desc: Sets the border color of the object.  To be used with border-width.

attrs.name: border-leftborderLeft
attrs.desc: Sets the object's left border style.  Accepts solid, dashed, and dotted styles.  Defaults to black if color is not properly set.

attrs.name: border-radiusborderRadius
attrs.desc: Sets the object's border radius, for rounded corners.  The higher the value, the more rounded the corners appear.

attrs.name: border-radius-bottom-leftborderRadiusBottomLeft
attrs.desc: Sets the object's bottom-left border radius, for rounded corners.

attrs.name: border-radius-bottom-rightborderRadiusBottomRight
attrs.desc: Sets the object's bottom-right border radius, for rounded corners.

attrs.name: border-radius-top-leftborderRadiusTopLeft
attrs.desc: Sets the object's top-left border radius, for rounded corners.

attrs.name: border-radius-top-rightborderRadiusTopRight
attrs.desc: Sets the object's top-right border radius, for rounded corners.

attrs.name: border-rightborderRight
attrs.desc: Sets the object's right border style.  Accepts solid, dashed, and dotted styles.  Defaults to black if color is not properly set.

attrs.name: border-topborderTop
attrs.desc: Sets the object's top border style.  Accepts solid, dashed, and dotted styles.  Defaults to black if color is not properly set.

attrs.name: border-widthborderWidth
attrs.desc: Sets the border width of the object.  If no border-color is set, will default to black.

attrs.name: callout
attrs.desc: Sets whether an object will have a callout arrow or not.

attrs.name: callout-extensioncalloutExtension
attrs.desc: Sets the length of the extension that extends beyond the tip of the callout arrow.

attrs.name: callout-heightcalloutHeight
attrs.desc: Sets the height of the object's callout arrow.  A larger value will create a taller callout arrow.

attrs.name: callout-hookcalloutHook
attrs.desc: Sets a location for the point of the tip of the callout arrow.  Uses [x, y] coordinates relative to the tooltip box.

attrs.name: callout-offsetcalloutOffset
attrs.desc: Sets the offset for the origin of the callout arrow.  Positive and negative values can be used to move the callout arrow up, down, left, or right, depending on the callout-position.

attrs.name: callout-positioncalloutPosition
attrs.desc: Sets the position for the object's callout arrow.  The position is "bottom" by default.

attrs.name: callout-widthcalloutWidth
attrs.desc: Sets the width of the object's callout arrow.

attrs.name: color
attrs.desc: Sets the object's text color.  Similar to font-color.

attrs.name: fill-anglefillAngle
attrs.desc: Sets the angle of the axis along which the linear gradient is drawn.

attrs.name: fill-offset-xfillOffsetX
attrs.desc: Sets an X offset to apply to the fill.

attrs.name: fill-offset-yfillOffsetY
attrs.desc: Sets an Y offset to apply to the fill.

attrs.name: fill-typefillType
attrs.desc: Sets the background gradient fill type to either linear or radial.

attrs.name: font-anglefontAngle
attrs.desc: Sets the rotation angle of the object and its text.  Similar to angle.

attrs.name: font-colorfontColor
attrs.desc: Sets the object's font color.  Similar to color.

attrs.name: font-familyfontFamily
attrs.desc: Sets the object's font family.

attrs.name: font-sizefontSize
attrs.desc: Sets the object's font size.

attrs.name: font-stylefontStyle
attrs.desc: Sets the object's font style.  Similar to italic.

attrs.name: font-weightfontWeight
attrs.desc: Sets the object's font weight.  Similar to bold.

attrs.name: gradient-colorsgradientColors
attrs.desc: Sets a set of colors for a complex gradient of 3 or more colors.  To be used with gradient-stops.

attrs.name: gradient-stopsgradientStops
attrs.desc: Sets a set of steps corresponding to each color for a complex gradient of 3 or more colors.  To be used with gradient-colors.

attrs.name: height
attrs.desc: Sets the object's height.

attrs.name: item
attrs.desc: Sets the item id of the map on which the object/shape is being added.

attrs.name: map
attrs.desc: Sets the map id of the map on which the object/shape is being added.

attrs.name: margin
attrs.desc: Sets the object's margin/s.

attrs.name: margin-bottommarginBottom
attrs.desc: Sets the object's bottom margin.

attrs.name: margin-leftmarginLeft
attrs.desc: Sets the object's left margin.

attrs.name: margin-rightmarginRight
attrs.desc: Sets the object's right margin.

attrs.name: margin-topmarginTop
attrs.desc: Sets the object's top margin.

attrs.name: max-charsmaxChars
attrs.desc: Sets the maximum numbers of characters displayed in the object.  The value determines how many characters will be displayed before the text is cut and appended with "..."

attrs.name: max-widthmaxWidth
attrs.desc: Sets the maximum width of the text box. If text is longer than the max-width value, it will overlap the box or will wrap if wrap-text is set to true.

attrs.name: offset-xoffsetX
attrs.desc: Sets an X offset for the object.

attrs.name: offset-yoffsetY
attrs.desc: Sets a Y offset for the object.

attrs.name: padding
attrs.desc: Sets the padding around the object's text.  Up to four values can be used to set the padding around the text, with the first value being the top padding, the second value being the right padding, the third value being the bottom padding, and the fourth value being the left padding.

attrs.name: padding-bottompaddingBottom
attrs.desc: Sets the bottom padding for the object's text.

attrs.name: padding-leftpaddingLeft
attrs.desc: Sets the left padding for the object's text.

attrs.name: padding-rightpaddingRight
attrs.desc: Sets the right padding for the object's text.

attrs.name: padding-toppaddingTop
attrs.desc: Sets the top padding for the object's text.

attrs.name: position
attrs.desc: Sets the object's position relative to it's container. Similar results can be obtained by setting margin and margin-... attributes.

attrs.name: rtl (right-to-left)
attrs.desc: Renders text right-to-left. Default value is false.

attrs.name: shadow
attrs.desc: Sets whether the object has a shdaow or not.  Defaults to a thin, gray shadow at a 45 degree angle.

attrs.name: shadow-alphashadowAlpha
attrs.desc: Sets the transparency of the object's shadow.

attrs.name: shadow-angleshadowAngle
attrs.desc: Sets the angle of the shadow (light source) applied to the object.

attrs.name: shadow-blurshadowBlur
attrs.desc: Sets the blur effect size for the object's shadow.  Limited effect on HTML5 implementation.

attrs.name: shadow-colorshadowColor
attrs.desc: Sets the color of the object's shadow.

attrs.name: shadow-distanceshadowDistance
attrs.desc: Sets the distance between the shadow and the object.

attrs.name: visible
attrs.desc: Sets whether the object is visible or not.

attrs.name: width
attrs.desc: Sets the width of the object.  May truncate text.

attrs.name: wrap-textwrapText
attrs.desc: Sets whether the text will wrap, depending on the width of the object.

attrs.name: x
attrs.desc: Sets the X position of the object.

attrs.name: y
attrs.desc: Sets the Y position of the object.

attrs.name: z-indexzIndex
attrs.desc: Sets the z position of the object. Objects with higher z indexes will appear "above" those with lower z index values.
